title: Maastricht Treaty of European Union provisions

content.question: Which of the following did European nations commit to when they signed the Treaty of European Union (Maastricht Treaty) in 1992 ?

choices.label: The adoption of a single official language for Europe
A new agricultural policy to increase productivity
A united effort to promote basic human rights outside of Europe
The introduction of a common currency
The establishment of a unified military force for all member nations

content.answer: The introduction of a common currency

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
